body_html:
@kvanhoey thank you for reporting this issue.

Could you please use a more recent version to see if you can reproduce this issue? I have tried reproducing this with a nightly build and do not see nearly as sharp of a difference (~4ms without shuffling and ~8ms with shuffling), the extra 4ms come from the overhead of shuffle when creating a batch of 5000 elements.

body:
@kvanhoey thank you for reporting this issue.

Could you please use a more recent version to see if you can reproduce this issue? I have tried reproducing this with a nightly build and do not see nearly as sharp of a difference (~4ms without shuffling and ~8ms with shuffling), the extra 4ms come from the overhead of shuffle when creating a batch of 5000 elements.
